card_text: (This card is always treated as a "Charmer" card.)$NYou can discard this card and 1 other FIRE monster; add 1 FIRE monster from your Deck to your hand with higher ATK than the other discarded monster, also you cannot activate non-FIRE monster effects for the rest of this turn. When your FIRE monster is destroyed by battle: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. You can only use each effect of "Hiita the Fire Channeler" once per turn.
